* Handles the {@code setbudget} command by parsing user input,
* validating it, and updating the budget if the input is valid.
* where {@code AMOUNT} is a non-negative number.

*
  • If the input is invalid or missing, usage instructions are shown.

*
  • If the amount is valid, the budget is updated and a confirmation is displayed.

* Entry point for the orCASHbuddy application.
* Prints a welcome message and exits gracefully when the user types "bye".
// Input closed (e.g., IDE stopped input). Exit silently.
* Handles user interactions such as displaying messages.
System.out.println("Bye. Hope to see you again soon!");
* Prints the confirmation for a newly added expense.

* @param expense The expense object that was deleted
* Displays a confirmation message showing the newly set total budget.
* @param budget the new budget amount to display
System.out.println("Your total budget is now $" + String.format("%.2f", budget) + ".");
